com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2
Class MobileConnectInterface

java.lang.Object
  com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2.MobileConnectInterface

public class MobileConnectInterface
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience wrapper for IDiscoveryService and IAuthenticationService methods for use with non-web applications.

Since:
2.0

Method Detail

attemptDiscoveryAsync

public java.util.concurrent.Future<MobileConnectStatus> attemptDiscoveryAsync(java.lang.String msisdn,
                                                                              java.lang.String mcc,
                                                                              java.lang.String mnc,
                                                                              MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Asynchronously attempt discovery using the supplied parameters. If msisdn, mcc and mnc are null the result will be operator selection, otherwise valid parameters will result in a StartAuthorization status.

Parameters:
msisdn - MSISDN from user
mcc - Mobile Country Code
mnc - Mobile Network Code
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

attemptDiscovery

public MobileConnectStatus attemptDiscovery(java.lang.String msisdn,
                                            java.lang.String mcc,
                                            java.lang.String mnc,
                                            MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Attempt discovery using the supplied parameters. If msisdn, mcc and mnc are null the result will be operator selection, otherwise valid parameters will result in a StartAuthorization status

Parameters:
msisdn - MSISDN from user
mcc - Mobile Country Code
mnc - Mobile Network Code
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

attemptDiscoveryAfterOperatorSelectionAsync

public java.util.concurrent.Future<MobileConnectStatus> attemptDiscoveryAfterOperatorSelectionAsync(java.net.URI redirectedUrl)
Asynchronously attempt discovery using the values returned from the operator selection redirect

Parameters:
redirectedUrl - URI redirected to by the completion of the operator selection UI
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

attemptDiscoveryAfterOperatorSelection

public MobileConnectStatus attemptDiscoveryAfterOperatorSelection(java.net.URI redirectedUrl)
Attempt discovery using the values returned from the operator selection redirect

Parameters:
redirectedUrl - URI redirected to by the completion of the operator selection UI
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

startAuthentication

public MobileConnectStatus startAuthentication(DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                               java.lang.String encryptedMsisdn,
                                               java.lang.String state,
                                               java.lang.String nonce,
                                               MobileConnectRequestOptions options)
Creates an authorization url with parameters to begin the authorization process

Parameters:
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
encryptedMsisdn - Encrypted MSISDN/Subscriber Id returned from the Discovery process
state - Unique state value, this will be returned by the authorization process and should be checked for equality as a secURIty measure
nonce - Unique value to associate a client session with an id token
options - Optional parameters
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

requestTokenAsync

public java.util.concurrent.Future<MobileConnectStatus> requestTokenAsync(DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                                                          java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                                                          java.lang.String expectedState,
                                                                          java.lang.String expectedNonce)
Request token using the values returned from the authorization redirect

Parameters:
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
redirectedUrl - URI redirected to by the completion of the authorization UI
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

requestToken

public MobileConnectStatus requestToken(DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                        java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                        java.lang.String expectedState,
                                        java.lang.String expectedNonce)
Synchronous wrapper for

Parameters:
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
redirectedUrl - URI redirected to by the completion of the authorization UI
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

handleUrlRedirectAsync

public java.util.concurrent.Future<MobileConnectStatus> handleUrlRedirectAsync(java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                                                               DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                                                               java.lang.String expectedState,
                                                                               java.lang.String expectedNonce)
Handles continuation of the process following a completed redirect. Only the redirectedUrl is required, however if the redirect being handled is the result of calling the Authorization URL then the remaining parameters are required.

Parameters:
redirectedUrl - Url redirected to by the completion of the previous step
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process

public MobileConnectStatus handleUrlRedirect(java.net.URI redirectedUrl,
                                             DiscoveryResponse discoveryResponse,
                                             java.lang.String expectedState,
                                             java.lang.String expectedNonce)

Parameters:
redirectedUrl - Url redirected to by the completion of the previous step
discoveryResponse - The response returned by the discovery process
expectedState - The state value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to validate the authenticity of the authorization process
expectedNonce - The nonce value returned from the StartAuthorization call should be passed here, it will be used to ensure the token was not requested using a replay attack
Returns:
MobileConnectStatus object with required information for continuing the Mobile Connect process
